# Test that basic motions work in presence of syntax errors

vim ex 'e main.go'

# Next start of File.Decl
vim ex 'normal ]]'
vim ex 'normal ]]'
vim expr '[getcurpos()[1], getcurpos()[2]]'
stdout '\[8,29\]'

-- go.mod --
module mod

-- main.go --
package main

	"fmt"
)

func main() {
	fmt.Println("hello, world!")
